# Wausau

Our knowledgeable personal injury attorneys in Wisconsin have helped many
people through the complexities of the legal process. We are dedicated to
protecting your rights and your livelihood, and will be your advocate every
step of the way. Our law firm in Wausau is located right in the heart of Rib
Mountain just off Highway 51 and minutes away from the Wisconsin River.

**Habush Habush & Rottier S.C.**

227110 Harrier Avenue

Wausau, WI 54401

Get Directions

(715) 842-4444

**Jump To:** Contact Us Services Locate Reviews Attorneys

## Find Your Path Forward

No upfront fees and no extra stress, get answers to questions like:

  * Do I have a case?
  * How will I pay my bills?
  * Can I talk with an attorney?

## A Hometown Firm You Can Trust

Our 13 locations ensure you get a hometown attorney who understands your life
and the impacts of your injury, and is personally committed to your recovery.

View All 13 Locations

To navigate, press the arrow keys.

## Meet Our Wausau  
Personal Injury Attorneys

At Habush Habush & Rottier, we have more than nine decades of experience
representing the rights of those who have suffered in Wausau car accidents,
medical malpractice, dog attacks, slip and falls, and other accidents.

If you have been hurt in an accident in Wausau, having one of our experienced
legal professionals on your side can increase your chances of securing the
full compensation you deserve.

### Peter M. Young
